Tasks.Task Description: Identify the security requirements for accessing Azure VMs through Azure Bastion. Determine compliance needs and security policies.
Create a design for the Azure Bastion deployment, including network topology, integration with existing VNet, and security controls.
Provision the Azure Bastion resource in the Azure portal, ensuring it is deployed in the same region as the target VMs.
Set up NSGs to control inbound and outbound traffic to the Azure Bastion subnet, ensuring only necessary traffic is allowed.
Define and assign RBAC roles to users and groups for accessing Azure Bastion, ensuring the principle of least privilege is followed.
Configure diagnostic settings for Azure Bastion to monitor and log access attempts, including successful and failed logins.
Ensure that all traffic to and from Azure Bastion is encrypted. Verify that TLS is configured correctly for secure connections.
Perform security testing, including penetration testing and vulnerability assessments, to identify and mitigate potential security risks.
Set up monitoring and alerting for Azure Bastion using Azure Monitor to track access patterns and detect anomalies.
Create documentation outlining security policies, procedures, and best practices for using Azure Bastion.
Regularly review and update security configurations and access controls for Azure Bastion to ensure compliance with security policies.
